Modular Speakers
  • How
  • About
  • Contact
Modular Speakers
Modular Speakers is an Ikea-style kit that includes everything you need to assemble high fidelity cabinet speakers.

Subscribe for occasional updates!

* indicates required

Custom Amplifier

Each speaker contains a powerful, plate-mounted amp that we designed and tested.

Precision Machined

Seven custom wood pieces designed for easy assembly and great audio quality.

Robust Subflooring

High-grade subflooring for high durability and smooth accoustics.

Accoustic structure

Structure is designed to get the best flat response from the tweeter and subwoofer.

Easily Sealed

Each cabinet is easily sealed with provided construction adhesive and some tissues.

About

The Modular Speaker cabinets were designed by a group of audio-passionate students at Virginia Tech. The idea was to make a simple speaker that just works for just about any application. Just plug it in and it can be used in a theater, desktop, living room, local business, or studio. And it will sound great.

Equivalent speaker systems on the market can get complicated and cost in the thousands. Since we produce everything and designed it to be easily assembled, you can get two "modular," studio-quality speaker setup for just $500.

Contact Us

modularspeakers@gmail.com
